# DataFrame.where

```python
DataFrame.where(
	condition: pyspark_dubber.sql.expr.Expr | str,
)
```

[PySpark API Reference](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/reference/pyspark.sql/api/pyspark.sql.DataFrame.where.html)

!!! warning "Incompatibility Note"

    Using a string as a SQL expressions is not supported yet.
